attributes.action: Offer free parking for NHS staff by the council.
attributes.additional_details: We should be allowed to use our car to travel to work safely and park with peace of mind and free of charge.
attributes.background: Allow free parking for NHS staff. Keep their current parking status and make it unlimited.

rejection.details:
You may like to sign the following petition which we currently have open:

Fund free parking for all NHS workers
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/560696
